properties.areaDesc: Monroe; Shelby; Lewis; Knox; Marion; Adams
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 3:58AM CST until January 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet
accumulations of 2 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of two
tenths to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35
mph.

* WHERE...Portions of northeast Missouri and west central
Illinois.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of ice accumulation and
strong winds could lead to isolated power outages.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet
and/or ice are expected. Strong winds are also possible. If
travel is necessary, make sure to exercise extreme caution. Begin
your travel with a full tank of gas, and carry a winter storm kit
which includes a shovel, flashlight, cellphone, food and water,
and blankets of extra warm clothing.

In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained on the
Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the
latest road conditions can be obtained on the Internet at
traveler.modot.org/map/ or by calling 1-888-275-6636.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT
